      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VersionAwareHttpIdentifierTranslator
      An extension of HttpIdentifierTranslator that includes mapping from JCR frozen nodes that represent versions of versionable nodes to a URI pattern that presents them as children of the original node.

      class  DefaultIdentifierTranslator
      A very simple IdentifierTranslator which translates JCR paths into un-dereference-able Fedora subjects (by replacing JCR-specific names with Fedora names).
